page.title: 01CHILD'S DAY
page.content: This is James Kyle's school day.It's Friday and I woke at 7.30 a.m.I got up at 7.45 and had my breakfast of a cup of coffee and two pieces of toast.At 8.30 I went by car to school.When I reach school I set my work out.At 9 the bell rings and I go into assembly where we sing hymns and say prayers.From 9.30 to 10.30 we usually do mathematics.At 10.30 we break for 15 minutes.From break till dinnertime we do English.Afternoon school starts at 1p.m.We begin by reading and this is followed by geography,chess and games such as stoolball,football,rounders and I go home at 3.30.I have my tea and then put sheep across the river on my three wheeler motor bike.Supper comes at 6.30.And I watch television until bedtime at ten o'clock.
